meanings.definition: A strip of material used to bind a wound or protect an injury.
meanings.sent1: The nurse applied clean bandages to the cut on my arm.
meanings.sent2: I keep extra bandages in my first aid kit for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The bandages looked like little white ribbons wrapped around the injury.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a soothing bandage on my wounded heart.
meanings.sent5: The bandages hugged the wound tightly, keeping it safe from harm.

meanings.definition: To cover or wrap with a bandage.
meanings.sent1: I carefully bandaged my finger after cutting it while cooking.
meanings.sent2: The doctor will bandage your ankle to help it heal faster.
meanings.sent3: She playfully bandages her stuffed animals when they 'get injured'.
meanings.sent4: His words bandaged her broken spirit and gave her hope.
meanings.sent5: The mother gently bandages her child's scraped knee, kissing it better.
